00014 #ifndef TILEMAPHARAGAAHGE_H
00015 #define TILEMAPHARAGAAHGE_H
00016 
00017 #include "config.h"
00018 #include <vector>
00019 
00020 #include "TileMapToolkit.h"
00021 
00022 template <class G> class TileMapGarbage : public TileMapIdleListener {
00023 private:
00024    enum {
00026       m_minFreeMem  = 40000,
00028       m_minBlockSize = 8096,
00029    };
00031    uint32 m_idleID;
00032 
00034    vector<G*> m_garbage;
00035 
00037    TileMapToolkit* m_toolkit;
00038 
00040    int m_isActive;
00041 
00042 public:
00048    TileMapGarbage( TileMapToolkit* toolkit ) {
00049       m_toolkit = toolkit;
00050       m_idleID  = 0;      
00051       activate();
00052    }
00053 
00055    virtual ~TileMapGarbage() {
00056       deActivate();
00057       m_toolkit->cancelIdle( this, m_idleID );
00058       
00059       while ( deleteSomeGarbage() ) {
00060          // Deleting
00061       }      
00062    }
00063    
00067    void checkGarbage() {
00068       // Delete garbage until there is some available memory.
00069       uint32 biggestBlock;
00070       while ( ( ( m_toolkit->availableMemory(biggestBlock) < m_minFreeMem ) ||
00071                 ( biggestBlock < m_minBlockSize ) ) &&
00072               deleteSomeGarbage() ) {
00073       }
00074    }
00075    
00077    inline void addGarbage( G* garb ) {
00078       m_garbage.push_back( garb );
00079       // Check if there is too much garbage already.
00080       checkGarbage();
00081       // Start the idle if this object is active.
00082       startIdle();
00083    }
00084 
00090    int deleteSomeGarbage() {
00091       if ( ! m_garbage.empty() ) {
00092          delete m_garbage.back();
00093          m_garbage.pop_back();
00094       }
00095       return ! m_garbage.empty();
00096    }
00097    
00101    void activate() { m_isActive = true; }
00102 
00106    void deActivate() { m_isActive = false; }
00107       
00108    
00109 private:
00111    friend class TileMapGarbageIdleListener;
00112    
00116    void runIdleTask( uint32 id ) {
00117       if ( id == m_idleID ) {
00118          mc2dbg8 << "[TileMapGarbage]: runIdleTask" << endl;
00119          m_idleID = 0;
00120          if ( deleteSomeGarbage() ) {
00121             startIdle();
00122          }
00123       }
00124    }
00125 
00129    int startIdle() {
00130       if ( m_isActive && m_idleID == 0 && ( ! m_garbage.empty() )) {
00131          m_idleID = m_toolkit->requestIdle( this );
00132          return true;
00133       } else {
00134          return false;
00135       }
00136    }
00137       
00138 };
00139 
00140 #endif
